planet.name: Dagobah
planet.desc: Dagobah is a star system in the Star Wars films The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. It also appears in a deleted scene from Revenge of the Sith. Yoda went into exile on Dagobah after a lightsaber battle with Darth Sidious.
The planet shown in Dagobah, in the Sluis sector, is a world of murky swamps, steaming bayous, and petrified forests, resembling Earth during the Carboniferous Period.
